"Lisa":
"Nice, I was completely absorbed in that.
I even thought a little that it'd be
nice to be shot at, if by you."
"Of course, if it was serious, I'd be in trouble. I like to shoot, but I don't really like to be shot."

"Besides, fighting someone like you
would be fun, but also a waste.
And I won't do it since it'd be a waste."

"So, let's stay good friends forever.
We'll shoot, shoot, shoot, and
kill, kill, kill hostiles together!"

"If we keep doing that as long
as we can, will we see peace someday?
Well, not that I care."
